page.title: 18Upton Noble Primary School.
page.content: {Upton Noble V.C. Primary School}is a rural{area-school}serving the villages of{Batcombe, Brewham, Witham {Friary, Wanstrow}and{Upton Noble.}The school opened in 1965 when the schools in these{villages}closed. Nowadays, nearly a quarter of our children come to Upton Noble from outside the catchment area. The overwhelming majority of children travel on some type of{transport whether it be{school coach, taxi}or {private car. There are 136{children}on roll, organised in five unstreamed classes, and the{age-range}is from{4+ to 11+. On transfer the children move to{Frome Middle Schools at 9+, or to King Arthur's Comprehensive,{Wincanton}or Whitstone Comprehensive,{Shepton {Mallet}at 11+.
